director.name: 基尼·雷蒂克尔 Gini Reticker

this_title: Pray the Devil Back to Hell
introduction: Pray the Devil Back to Hell chronicles the remarkable story of the courageous Liberian women who came together to end a bloody civil war and bring peace to their shattered country.Thousands of women - ordinary mothers, grandmothers, aunts and daughters, both Christian and Muslim - came together to pray for peace and then staged a silent protest outside of the Presidential Pala...
foreign_title: Pray the Devil Back to Hell
